about_the_game:
Transport Book

This Transport-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Trains, Planes and Motor Vehicles!

Put your seat belt on and color how we can traverse the world!

Contents

The Transport book unlocks the following images:
  • Rollerblades - 85x75
  • Bicycle - 85x82
  • Skateboard - 89x37
  • Jetplane - 91x84
  • Motorbike - 93x58
  • Sailboat - 96x99
  • Propellor Plane - 98x36
  • Van - 98x61
  • Zeppelin - 99x56
  • Steam Train - 99x84
  • Taxi - 100x47
  • Bus - 100x52
  • Metro - 100x66
  • Tram - 100x87
  • Truck - 100x88
  • Car - 110x50
  • Helicopter - 116x82
  • Hotair Balloon - 120x120
  • Ferry - 145x60
  • High Speed Train - 300x35

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Transport Pack

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
